title: General
stimulusHtml:
2 points —from either or both areas below


1. They have lost a controlling population factor from their original habitat: predator, pathogen, or parasite.

2. They have a novel evolutionary advantage brought to the island from their original habitat: an aspect that provides an advantage—a chemical defense, flight advantage, novel enzyme, etc.
descriptions:
Student response earns none of the available points.

2 points —from either or both areas below


1. They have lost a controlling population factor from their original habitat: predator, pathogen, or parasite.

2. They have a novel evolutionary advantage brought to the island from their original habitat: an aspect that provides an advantage—a chemical defense, flight advantage, novel enzyme, etc.

Student response earns one of the available points.

2 points —from either or both areas below


1. They have lost a controlling population factor from their original habitat: predator, pathogen, or parasite.

2. They have a novel evolutionary advantage brought to the island from their original habitat: an aspect that provides an advantage—a chemical defense, flight advantage, novel enzyme, etc.

Student response earns all of the available points.

2 points —from either or both areas below


1. They have lost a controlling population factor from their original habitat: predator, pathogen, or parasite.

2. They have a novel evolutionary advantage brought to the island from their original habitat: an aspect that provides an advantage—a chemical defense, flight advantage, novel enzyme, etc.
